meanings.definition: A player in the game of cricket who is currently batting.
meanings.sent1: The young batsman hit the ball with his bat.
meanings.sent2: The batsman scored a century in the cricket match.
meanings.sent3: The batsman swung the bat so hard, he almost hit the wicketkeeper!
meanings.sent4: She was a batsman in the game of life, facing challenges head-on.
meanings.sent5: The batsman's focus was unwavering as he awaited the bowler's delivery.

meanings.definition: A person who wields a bat, especially in baseball.
meanings.sent1: The little league batsman practiced hitting the ball every day.
meanings.sent2: The professional batsman signed autographs for young fans.
meanings.sent3: The batsman accidentally knocked over the water cooler with his bat.
meanings.sent4: She was a batsman in the art of negotiation, always ready to swing her arguments.
meanings.sent5: The batsman's powerful swing sent the baseball soaring into the stands.
